languages.text: Кьява Гамма пала на милость культистов — служителей Архиврага, превративших индустриальный мир в горнило зла и ереси.
Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма пала на милость культистов — служителей Архиврага, превративших индустриальный мир в горнило зла и ереси.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.
Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星落入了邪教徒的魔掌，混沌大敌的仆人已经将这个工业世界变为了异端与邪恶的熔炉。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星落入了邪教徒的魔掌，混沌大敌的仆人已经将这个工业世界变为了异端与邪恶的熔炉。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、産業惑星を悪と異端の炉に変えた渾沌の勢力のしもべである教団の慈悲にゆだねられた。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、産業惑星を悪と異端の炉に変えた渾沌の勢力のしもべである教団の慈悲にゆだねられた。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma ha caído en manos de sectarios, sirvientes del Archienemigo que han transformado el mundo industrial en un crisol de maldad y herejía.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma ha caído en manos de sectarios, sirvientes del Archienemigo que han transformado el mundo industrial en un crisol de maldad y herejía.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma wurde der Gnade von Kultisten überlassen ... Dienern des Erzfeindes, die die Produktionswelt in einen Schmelztiegel des Bösen und der Häresie verwandelt haben.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma wurde der Gnade von Kultisten überlassen ... Dienern des Erzfeindes, die die Produktionswelt in einen Schmelztiegel des Bösen und der Häresie verwandelt haben.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma a été laissé à la merci de cultistes, des serviteurs du Grand Ennemi qui ont transformé ce monde industriel en un creuset de malfaisance et d'hérésie.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma a été laissé à la merci de cultistes, des serviteurs du Grand Ennemi qui ont transformé ce monde industriel en un creuset de malfaisance et d'hérésie.

languages.text: Kiava Gama, Şerbaşı'nın sınai dünyayı kötülük ve kâfirlik yuvasına çeviren hizmetkârları olan tarikatçıların merhametinde.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma has been left to the mercies of cultists — servants of the Archenemy who have transformed the industrial world into a furnace of evil and heresy.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama tarikatçıların, Şerbaşı'nın endüstri dünyasını kötülük ve kâfirlik yuvasına çeviren hizmetkârlarının merhametine kalmış.
